mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) CNT_KMU FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT HCO_MST.INS_NO ,HCO_MST.INS_ABBR_NAME ,HCP_MST.DOC_NO ,HCP_MST.DOC_KANJ ,HCP_YAKUSHOKU.TITLE_KJ PRE_TITLE_KJ ,HCP_YAKUSHOKU.TITLE_KJ POST_TITLE_KJ ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_KANJI PRE_DEPT_KANJI ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_KANJI POST_DEPT_KANJI ,HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE PRE_TITLE_CODE ,HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE POST_TITLE_CODE ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE PRE_DEPT_CODE ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE POST_DEPT_CODE ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_KANA PRE_DEPT_KANA ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_KANA POST_DEPT_KANA ,HCP_WORK.JOB_FORM ,HCP_WORK.UNIV_POS_CODE ,HCP_WORK.DCC ,HCO_MST.ULT_INS_NO ,HCP_MST.ULT_DOC_NO ,HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.SORT_NUM1 ,HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.SORT_NUM2 ,HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.SORT_NUM3 ,HCP_YAKUSHOKU.SORT_NUM FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP_MST INNER JOIN M_RDM_HCP_WORK HCP_WORK ON HCP_MST.DOC_NO = HCP_WORK.DOC_NO INNER JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO_MST ON HCO_MST.INS_NO = HCP_WORK.INS_NO INNER JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU.TITLE_CODE = HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU.UNIV_TITLE_FLG = '0' AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU.DEL_FLG = '0' INNER JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.DEPT_CODE = HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.DEL_FLG = '0' INNER JOIN M_RDM_JKR_MR_INS_DOC_TRT MR_INS_DOC_TRT ON MR_INS_DOC_TRT.DOC_NO = HCP_WORK.DOC_NO INNER JOIN M_RDM_JGI_SOS_MST JGI_SOS_MST ON JGI_SOS_MST.JGI_NO = MR_INS_DOC_TRT.JGI_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST DUMMY_CODE_MST ON DUMMY_CODE_MST.CODE_NAME = 'DUMMY_HCO' AND DUMMY_CODE_MST.DEL_FLG = '0' AND DUMMY_CODE_MST.VALUE1 = HCP_WORK.INS_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND HCP_MST.DEL_FLG = '0' --No0 AND DUMMY_CODE_MST.VALUE1 IS NULL --No1 --AND HCO_MST.INS_KANJ_SRCH like '%%' --No2 AND HCO_MST.INS_NO = '001004075' --No3 --AND HCP_MST.DOC_KANJI_SRCH = LIKE '%%' --No4 --AND HCP_MST.DOC_NO = '' --No5 --AND HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE = '' --組織が選択されている場合 --No6 --AND JGI_SOS_MST.UP_SOS_CD = '' --No7 --AND JGI_SOS_MST.SOS_CD = '' --担当者が選択されている場合 --No8 --AND JGI_SOS_MST.BR_CODE = '' --No9 --AND JGI_SOS_MST.DIST_CODE = '' --No10 --AND JGI_SOS_MST.JGI_NO = '' ) SELECT_KMU

SELECT DISTINCT HCO_MST.INS_NO ,HCO_MST.INS_ABBR_NAME ,HCP_MST.DOC_NO ,HCP_MST.DOC_KANJ ,HCP_YAKUSHOKU.TITLE_KJ PRE_TITLE_KJ ,HCP_YAKUSHOKU.TITLE_KJ POST_TITLE_KJ ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_KANJI PRE_DEPT_KANJI ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_KANJI POST_DEPT_KANJI ,HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE PRE_TITLE_CODE ,HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE POST_TITLE_CODE ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE PRE_DEPT_CODE ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE POST_DEPT_CODE ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_KANA PRE_DEPT_KANA ,HCP_WORK.DEPT_KANA POST_DEPT_KANA ,HCP_WORK.JOB_FORM ,HCP_WORK.UNIV_POS_CODE ,HCP_WORK.DCC ,HCO_MST.ULT_INS_NO ,HCP_MST.ULT_DOC_NO ,HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.SORT_NUM1 ,HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.SORT_NUM2 ,HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.SORT_NUM3 ,HCP_YAKUSHOKU.SORT_NUM FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP_MST INNER JOIN M_RDM_HCP_WORK HCP_WORK ON HCP_MST.DOC_NO = HCP_WORK.DOC_NO INNER JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO_MST ON HCO_MST.INS_NO = HCP_WORK.INS_NO INNER JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU.TITLE_CODE = HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU.UNIV_TITLE_FLG = '0' AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU.DEL_FLG = '0' INNER JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.DEPT_CODE = HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.DEL_FLG = '0' INNER JOIN M_RDM_JKR_MR_INS_DOC_TRT MR_INS_DOC_TRT ON MR_INS_DOC_TRT.DOC_NO = HCP_WORK.DOC_NO INNER JOIN M_RDM_JGI_SOS_MST JGI_SOS_MST ON JGI_SOS_MST.JGI_NO = MR_INS_DOC_TRT.JGI_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST DUMMY_CODE_MST ON DUMMY_CODE_MST.CODE_NAME = 'DUMMY_HCO' AND DUMMY_CODE_MST.DEL_FLG = '0' AND DUMMY_CODE_MST.VALUE1 = HCP_WORK.INS_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND HCP_MST.DEL_FLG = '0' --No0 AND DUMMY_CODE_MST.VALUE1 IS NULL --No1 --AND HCO_MST.INS_KANJ_SRCH like '%%' --No2 AND HCO_MST.INS_NO = '001004075' --No3 --AND HCP_MST.DOC_KANJI_SRCH = LIKE '%%' --No4 --AND HCP_MST.DOC_NO = '' --No5 --AND HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE = '' --組織が選択されている場合 --No6 --AND JGI_SOS_MST.UP_SOS_CD = '' --No7 --AND JGI_SOS_MST.SOS_CD = '' --担当者が選択されている場合 --No8 --AND JGI_SOS_MST.BR_CODE = '' --No9 --AND JGI_SOS_MST.DIST_CODE = '' --No10 --AND JGI_SOS_MST.JGI_NO = '' ORDER BY HCO_MST.INS_NO, HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.SORT_NUM1, HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.SORT_NUM2, HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA.SORT_NUM3, HCP_YAKUSHOKU.SORT_NUM, HCP_MST.DOC_NO OFFSET #{inOffset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{inLimit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT WOR.INS_NO , NVL(WOR.JOB_FORM, 'Z') AS JOB_FORM , NVL(WOR.DEPT_CODE, 'Z') AS DEPT_CODE , NVL(WOR.DEPT_KANJI, 'Z') AS DEPT_KANJI , NVL(WOR.DEPT_KANA, 'Z') AS DEPT_KANA , WOR.UNIV_POS_CODE , WOR.TITLE_CODE , WOR.DCC , HCP.ULT_DOC_NO , RDM_COMMON.GET_NEXT_BIZDAY(RDM_COMMON.GET_TODAY) AS NEXT_BIZDAY FROM M_RDM_HCP_WORK WOR INNER JOIN M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP ON 1 = 1 AND HCP.DOC_NO = WOR.DOC_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND WOR.DOC_NO = #{inDocNo}
